files.patch:
@@ -314,1 +314,2 @@
-    # source files.
+    # source files. Need to call DoubleDollar as we have java classes with '$' in
+    # their names.
@@ -316,1 +317,2 @@
-        $$(eval relative_src := $$(call remove-prefixes, $$($1_SRC), $$(s))) \
+        $$(eval relative_src := $$(call remove-prefixes, $$($1_SRC), \
+            $$(call DoubleDollar, $$(s)))) \
